document.full_text: a new york woman who admitted mistreating her children and torturing and killing dozens of pets, some in front of the youngsters, was sentenced to two years in prison on wednesday.
document.title: new york woman sentenced to two years for animal abuse
lines_and_colors: a new york woman who admitted mistreating her children and torturing and killing dozens of pets, some in front of the youngsters, was sentenced to two years in prison on wednesday.
